item.title: Movie Review: Nemesis (1992)
item.description: Nemesis (1992) - Link to heading Follow me on Letterboxd! Ok, am I missing something, or was this movie just hot garbage? What is there to like about Nemesis? Shitty writing and acting, cheesy costumes and props, outdated effects, and a plot which is just downright boring make this seem like a student film that got the budget of a B-tier film in the 70s. Let’s go one by one.
